definition: shuffling by splitting the pack and interweaving the two halves at their corners, shuffle (playing cards) by separating the deck into two parts and riffling with the thumbs so the cards intermix
details:
noun
- shuffling by splitting the pack and interweaving the two halves at their corners
- a small wave on the surface of a liquid
= synonyms: ripple, rippling, wavelet
verb
- shuffle (playing cards) by separating the deck into two parts and riffling with the thumbs so the cards intermix
- twitch or flutter
= synonyms: ruffle, flick
- stir up (water) so as to form ripples
= synonyms: undulate, ruffle, cockle, ripple
- look through a book or other written material
= synonyms: flip, leaf, thumb, flick, riff
